description.value:
Primary Energy: Water 2 (manipulating water) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (close range) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Instantaneous (or 1 hour for changes) Total Cost: 3 Energy per effect Action: Simple weave (1 action) Weaving Roll: Water Potential + Water Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Choose one: (1) Move up to 5ft cube of water up to 5 feet, (2) Shape water into simple forms that last 1 hour, (3) Change color/opacity for 1 hour, (4) Freeze water (unfrozen creatures can escape with [[/save type=reflex]]). Saving Throw: Reflex (if freezing water with creatures in it, to escape) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 2ft cube, 2 = 5ft cube, 3 = 10ft cube, 4 = permanent shape/color changes, 5 = 20ft cube + permanent

---
